com.rigado.rigablue

Class RigFirmwareUpdateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rigado.rigablue.RigFirmwareUpdateService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRigLeBaseDeviceObserver, IRigLeConnectionManagerObserver

    public class RigFirmwareUpdateService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRigLeConnectionManagerObserver, IRigLeBaseDeviceObserver
    This class provides glueing of the Rigado DFU service to the firmware update manager. It is responsible for interfacing with the Device being updated and providing feedback to the firmware update manager object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RigFirmwareUpdateService()
      Creates a new firmware service object.

        Connects to the device being updated.

      • reconnectDevice

        public void reconnectDevice()
        Reconnects to the device being updated. This is left for backwards compatibility with old bootloaders that required a full erase and reboot before the update could start.

      • setDevice

      • getServiceAndCharacteristics

        public boolean getServiceAndCharacteristics()
        Instructs the #RigFirmwareUpdateService to search the update device for the DFU and DIS services and to fill out the characteristic objects.
        Returns:
        Returns true if successful; false otherwise

      • isSecureDfu

        public boolean isSecureDfu()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the bootloader is the secure bootloader; false otherwise.

      • disconnectDevice

      • didConnectDevice

        public void didConnectDevice(RigLeBaseDevice device)
        Called when a device connects. If it is the update device, then it starts service and characteristic discovery.

        Parameters:

      • didDisconnectDevice

        public void didDisconnectDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice)
        Called when a device disconnects. Handles the logic for what should happen based on the state of the reconnection variables.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
